I bought a new house six years ago, and it feels like I spent maybe fucking 8 hours a week in my house, just getting me back around the house. More time with the kids, more time with the wife, freeing up that w two mindset where I was on a salary so I knew what I was going to make every single week. I can just say the fact that I havent been employed by anybody for six months and Im still being able to pay my bills, I bought brand new vehicles.
